theArray.quote: Anderson, don’t talk out loud. You lower the IQ of the whole street.
theArray.name: Sherlock

theArray.quote: Every fairy tale needs a good old-fashioned villain
theArray.name: Moriarty

theArray.quote: We are in Buckingham Palace, the very heart of the British nation. Sherlock Holmes, put your trousers on!
theArray.name: Mycroft

theArray.quote: I’m not a psychopath, Anderson. I’m a high-functioning sociopath.
theArray.name: Sherlock

theArray.quote: The present is theirs; the future, for which I really worked, is mine.
theArray.name: Tesla

theArray.quote: The day science begins to study non-physical phenomena, it will make more progress in one decade than in all the previous centuries of its existence.
theArray.name: Tesla

theArray.quote: If your hate could be turned into electricity, it would light up the whole world.
theArray.name: Tesla

theArray.quote: Immorality, no less than morality, has at all times found support in religion.
theArray.name: Freud

theArray.quote: Whoever loves becomes humble. Those who love have , so to speak , pawned a part of their narcissism.
theArray.name: Freud

theArray.quote: No, our science is no illusion. But an illusion it would be to suppose that what science cannot give us we can get elsewhere.
theArray.name: Freud

theArray.quote: Everywhere I go I find a poet has been there before me.
theArray.name: Freud

theArray.quote: The madman is a dreamer awake
theArray.name: Freud

theArray.quote: The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding.
theArray.name: Leonardo da Vinci

theArray.quote: The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions.
theArray.name: Leonardo da Vinci

theArray.quote: Painting is poetry that is seen rather than felt, and poetry is painting that is felt rather than seen.
theArray.name: Leonardo da Vinci

theArray.quote: If an injury has to be done to a man it should be so severe that his vengeance need not be feared.
theArray.name: Machiavelli

theArray.quote: Never was anything great achieved without danger.
theArray.name: Machiavelli

theArray.quote: There is no other way to guard yourself against flattery than by making men understand that telling you the truth will not offend you.
theArray.name: Machiavelli

theArray.quote: Never attempt to win by force what can be won by deception.
theArray.name: Machiavelli

theArray.quote: Men are driven by two principal impulses, either by love or by fear.
theArray.name: Machiavelli

theArray.quote: Men are so simple of mind, and so much dominated by their immediate needs, that a deceitful man will always find plenty who are ready to be deceived.
theArray.name: Machiavelli

theArray.quote: The promise given was a necessity of the past, the word broken is a necessity of the present.
theArray.name: Machiavelli

theArray.quote: I think, therefore I am.
theArray.name: Rene Deskartes

theArray.quote: Doubt is the origin of wisdom
theArray.name: Rene Deskartes

theArray.quote: Conquer yourself rather than the world.
theArray.name: Rene Deskartes

theArray.quote: It is not enough to have a good mind, the main thing is to use it well.
theArray.name: Rene Deskartes

theArray.quote: The greatest minds are capable of the greatest vices as well as of the greatest virtues.
theArray.name: Rene Deskartes

theArray.quote: I see now that the circumstances of one's birth are irrelevant. It is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are.
theArray.name: Mewtwo
